#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define FOR(i,a,b)  for(int i = a; i < b ; i++)
#define SIZE(a) sizeof(a)/sizeof(*a)
#define m 1000010
#define M 10000
#define Malloc(p,s) p = malloc(s)
#define swap(x,y,t) ((t) = (x), (x) = (y), (y) = (t))
#define gc getchar
int readInt() {
  char c = gc();
  while(c<'0' || c>'9') c = gc();
  int ret = 0;
  while(c>='0' && c<='9') {
    ret = 10 * ret + c - 48;
    c = gc();
  }
  return ret;
}
ll int DP(int n)
{
    ll int catalan[n+1];
    catalan[0] = catalan[1] = 1;
    for (int i=2; i<=n; i++)
    {
        catalan[i] = 0;
        for (int j=0; j<i; j++)
            catalan[i] += ((catalan[j]%M) * (catalan[i-j-1]%M))%M;
    }
    return catalan[n];
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    t=readInt();
    //cout<<t;
    FOR(i,0,t)
    {
        int n;
        n=readInt();
        //cout<<n;
        cout<<(DP(n-1)%M)<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
